QuestData.Title: Disturbance Detected: Ulduar
QuestData.Description:
You're late. Don't you remember the last time we had to deal with the tampering that allowed Yogg-Saron to escape from his prison underneath Ulduar? You were late then too. You should really try to be more punctual.
Well, get going! Old gods! Keepers! Titan stuff! Get this one checked off your list so we can move on. We've got times and places to be.
<Vormu gestures impatiently for you to leave.>
